alert.note: Alert for Madison; Rankin (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 19 at 8:58PM CDT until further notice by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River near Lena affecting Leake County. Pearl River Above Philadelphia affecting Neshoba County. Pearl River Near Ratliff`s Ferry affecting Madison and Rankin Counties. Pearl River Near Carthage affecting Leake County. Pearl River At Edinburg affecting Leake County. For the Upper Pearl River...including Philadelphia, Edinburg, Carthage, Walnut Grove, Lena, Kosciusko, Ratliff`s Ferry, Ofahoma, Jackson...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River Near Ratliff`s Ferry. * WHEN...From Wednesday evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 303.0 feet, Minor overbank flooding is occurring along the reach of the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM CDT Monday the stage was 299.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Wednesday evening and continue rising to 303.5 feet Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 303.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Pearl River Ratliff`s Ferr 303.0 299.4 Mon 8 pm CDT 301.8 303.0 303.5 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Tuesday morning at 1000 AM CDT.
